string-array.name: Aries
string-array.item: Gets angry, then forgets why they were angry
Thinks everything is a game they can win
Will do anything on a dare

string-array.name: Gemini
string-array.item: Could talk to a brick wall

string-array.name: Cancer
string-array.item: Only has one boundary, but it is very firm

string-array.name: Virgo
string-array.item: Has a quick fix for everything

string-array.name: Scorpio
string-array.item: Looks cool in a leather jacket
Can\'t be sure if they\'re serious or joking
Eyes that look into your soul

string-array.name: Sagittarius
string-array.item: Forms opinions off of pure emotion
Wields their truth like a blunt weapon

string-array.name: Capricorn
string-array.item: Full grown adult since age six
Takes a while to warm up to people
Represses any emotion that gets in the way of success

string-array.name: Aquarius
string-array.item: More in love with humanity as a whole than individuals

string-array.name: Pisces
string-array.item: Somehow both 5 and 50 years old at once
Can\'t remember if they dreamt it or it actually happened
